description.value: When Encountering a creature with this trait, make a Willpower test modifed based on X, on failiure roll on Table 10-4 Shock, add +10 for each degree of failiure. X may be: 1 (Disturbing, -0), 2 (Frightening, -10), 3 (Horrifying, -20), or 4 (Terrifying, -30)

system.benefit: When Encountering a creature with this trait, make a Willpower test modifed based on X, on failiure roll on Table 10-4 Shock, add +10 for each degree of failiure. X may be: 1 (Disturbing, -0), 2 (Frightening, -10), 3 (Horrifying, -20), or 4 (Terrifying, -30)
